product.name: Sun Smart Blakesly Blackout Curtains Patio Window, Ikat Print, Grommet Top Living Room Decor, Living Room Decor, Thermal Insulated Light Blocking Drape for Bedroom and Apartments, 50" x 84", Taupe
product.description: Introducing a modern and stylish take on energy efficiency, our SUN SMART Blakesly Printed Ikat Blackout Panel is the perfect update to any room. Fresh and chic, this Single Window panel features a printed taupe ikat design on a textured firm base fabric, creating dimension for a cool and casual look. Finished with a two pass foamback and bonding technique, the panel is enhanced to block most sunlight and create a significant barrier to reduce outside noise. Silver grommet top detail makes it easy to hang, open, and close Panel throughout the day; while fitting up to a standard 1.25” diameter rod. With considerable energy savings and a high level of added privacy, this blackout panel is perfect for home offices, family rooms, and bedrooms. Give your space a beautiful, one-of-a-kind update with this contemporary blackout Single Window panel. Lighting level: Heavily Shaded Ambiance.
product.bullet_points:
• Patio blinds features a printed taupe ikat design on a textured base fabric, creating dimension for a cool and casual look.
• Blackout foamback liner offers privacy and noise reduction and maintains room temperature for energy efficiency.
• Easy to use silver gromment top fits up to 1. 25" diameter rod
• 1 Single Window Panel: 50"W x 84"L, as shown in image - Need to purchase 2 curtain Panel for each Single Window for standard coverage.
• Care instructions: machine washable
